name: NYDailyNews
text:
An NYPD precinct came under fire after posting an online photo praising a cop wearing a mask with the logo of a blood-thirsty Marvel Comics vigilante.

The character Punisher portrays an ex-N.Y. cop turned vigilante who revels in extrajudicial killings.
https://t.co/GmakK24cFe

name: NYDailyNews
text:
California police have cracked a 25-year-old rape case after new tests on DNA evidence.

Ralph Kroll, 49, has been arrested and charged with rape by force, kidnapping, and the use of a deadly weapon by a sex offender.
https://t.co/NtPCmXKKy1
